channel.title: rC3 – Mobilizon “Let's take back control of our events!”
channel.description:
[date=2020-12-29 time=19:45:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]
External event, see https://mobilizon.fr/events/afe91b27-593d-4575-9ce1-6b4794334275 or https://talks.rc3.oio.social/r3c-oio/talk/DTUSBT/ for details:
“ Facebook Events dominates online event promotion ... even within the iconoclastic scene of Berlin. We seek to rally artists, clubs, and event organizers in Berlin (and elsewhere) to adopt a new, decentralized and federated, free software alternative to Facebook: *Mobilizon* [1]. In our talk we present the technical and political/social aspects of *Mobilizon* ”
